tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a very warm person which makes it very easy to talk to her and ask questions. Iv been going to her for years and it’s been more than satisfactory ..  highly  Recommend  Dr Hemlata..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
General check up
She came across a very genuine soul 
She took complete medical history and explained everything very well

There are few points i would like to highlight 
1. Dr is very professional and polite as well the way she handles the patient is amazing she will treat you like a family member 
2. If you’re nervous or not confident and once you had a word with doctor automatically your will be confident because of her politeness and caring behaviour 
3. If you want to get treated everything related to pregnancy in a very professional way and with confidence I would definitely recommend Dr Hemlata

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have been knowing Dr Hemlata since more than 9 years. She has always been so patient , supportive, understanding and caring.  She makes you feel comfortable, calmly lessons to your problems and guides you.  People many times fear to visit doctors but with her it's totally a different experience. Infact one will forget their problem after meeting her. Thank you doctor for always being there.

Aastha Nerkar

Doctor was very patient in listening to the concerns. She examines the patient properly and answers any queries required. I found her to be easy to talk to and the whole process, including interactions with the staff were very smooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: We have been visiting Dr. Hemlata since 2018. My both child has delivered by Dr. Hemlata only. We ( my husband and I) is very grateful to ma'am. No words is enough to express our gratitude to the doctor. She is absolutely calm, listen to the patients and available whenever u need like 24×7. She is not only very experienced and expert in the field but also a good human being too. Upon listening her comforting voice, our insecurities, worries instantly dies and the confidence building up. I strongly recommend Dr hemlata ma'am for smooth and joyous birthing experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is extremely soft and poliet with brilliant diagnosis. The performed a safe surgery and gave great support with proper explanation to my family

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have consulted Dr Hemlata for both my pregnancies, (both being fairly risky ones). Dr Hemlata is very prompt in diagnosis and the action to be taken and that has helped me a lot. She is very warm and comforting which goes a long way and what is most needed by an expectant mother. She is very patient and answers all your questions with a smile on her face. Would definitely and always recommend her to every woman, whether looking for pregnancy care or other gynaecological matters.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been visiting Dr Hemlata for my PCOS issues and when I became pregnant there was no second thought to it that she will only deliver my baby. My pregnancy journey was smooth with the right guidance from Dr Hemlata. She was available at all times I had any doubt or query. My delivery was smooth and I’m glad to deliver a beautiful baby girl in her able hands. I really like her calm and positive vibe which makes me feel comfort in times of doubts and anxiety. Thank you Dr Hemlata.
Special mention to the exceptional staff at Mothers care clinic who have been extremely helpful throughout

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
** ******** ** **** **** **************
My preganancy was normal preganancy only.
But like every mother you have lot of anxiety issues regarding your baby.
She was always soft and warm while talking with us.. which I found very comforting.
As long as  your docter is comforting by nature you are relaxed.
Entire 9th months journey with her was truly amazing.. 
Every doubt was cleared by her.
I had  planned c-section as my baby was due .
Ot was booked at cloud 9 hospital at 3pm on 1st may 2023.
Docter hemalata was exact at time at 3pm and I was shifted to OT.
She had huge smile which I found little comforting as I was stressed like every mother but her smile helped me to relax and her motherly approx was very much comforting very time..
Operation took one hour approx. She really did great job!! People say docters are angel .. for me Dr hemalata was a angel who delivered by baby boy safely. Me and my baby both were delivered safely.
She has so much positivity inside her.. you can feel those vibes.
I would recommend Dr hemalata to everyone
Well experienced!! Senior!! The best!! 
Thankyou Dr Hemlata so much! ❤️❤️❤️❤️

- Tanvi Naik

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Compassionate, caring, articulate and a thorough professional are the words that best describes Dr. Hemlata. She has guided us beautifully through this journey of pregnancy. 
Every time we met her it made us feel more at ease. She takes great efforts to make sure the patients are comfortable and answers each questions in a simple manner. 
I would highly recommend her to everyone who is pregnant. She will make your journey easier and far more enjoyable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
One of my cousins  was  suffering  from  acute  BREAST PAIN  for  quite  some time.  We,  at  Guwahati,  consulted  a  number  of  eminent
 doctors  and  they  were  of  the  opinion  that   it's   a  case  of 
 MASTALGIA......We  tried  their  medicines ;  but  in  vain  and  without  any  result.    Fortunately,  we  were  destined  to  meet  a  divine  doctor  like  Dr. Hemlata  Hardasani   and  Dr. Hemlata  was  kind  enough  to  give  us    online  consultation    for  the  same  during  the   Lockdown  days.  Today  is  the   5th  day  of  taking  Dr. Hemlata's  medicines.  She  gives  very  little  but  precise  medicine  and  her  medicines  have  started  giving  results.  ***  ***********  ***  ****  *** *********  *********  ****  ****  ****   *******   **  ***  ***  **  ***  **********  ******  **  **********  ***  *******  **  ***  ****  **  *********  ****** *  she  has  a   GOD-gifted   caring  look  &  encouraging  voice  to  heal  the  most  critical  situation  with  alarming  development.  

May  GOD  give  her  more  strength  &  energy  to  help  the  less fortunate  and  the  needy.   GOD  bless  Dr.  Hemlata.....

review: Dr.  Hemalatha is renowned for her expertise in gynecology. With over more than a decade of experience, she's dedicated in understanding my health, providing compassionate care. Her professionalism, patience, thoroughness, and ability to address the concerns with empathy and skill, making her a top choice in her field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Prenatal Checkup,Pregnancy Scan,
review:
Choosing Dr. Hemlata was the best decision we made when it came to my pregnancy & normal vaginal delivery (nvd).
She’s very patient, caring & gives time to everyone as required. She built confidence in us to go for nvd & successfully delivered our baby girl by nvd! We cannot thank her enough for all the support she provided us through our pregnancy journey.
Also her staff at Mothers care clinic are very friendly and accommodative, making every visit more comfortable.

I would highly recommend everyone to visit her for pregnancy related issues.
Regards,
Proud Parents

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had my first pregnancy journey with Dr Hemalata from conceiving  to delivering my twins she was always so supportive and understanding it really helped me and calmed me everytime I panicked . She understands me and my fears never gets annoyed with me in fact treats me like her close one.. Now after 8 years again I have started my  pregnancy journey with her so far everything is good  and in her guidance I pray all will be good..Thanks Dr Hemalata I appreciate  everything you are doing for me…

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been showing my endometriosis disorder with Dr Hemlata ma’am for the last couple of years and she has Ben pushing the surgery and tried all best to recover me with medicines but finally, I need to go thru surgery, Dr. Hemlata ma’am is like a mother to me and supported me in aspects since the last couple of years, anytime, anywhere she is always available to support me, her softness towards the issue approach itself gives a lot of confidence that I don’t need to worry anything, *** ** *** **** *** I will always thankful to ma’am towards my recovery. 🙏🥰

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Hemlata is a very caring and experienced professional. I have been visiting her since 2017 and both my children were delivered in her care. She ensures all doubts are clarified to the patient's satisfaction.I would highly recommend Dr Hemlata to anyone who is looking for an experienced gynaecologist who provides excellent care and is an expert in her field.

She very well explain the process of the treatment to the patient.
My child birth experience was incredible and thanks to doctor even though it was a c-sec she made it possible in every way.We appreciate everything you have done. Thank you so much for the difference you make in the lives of your patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Hemlata has ********* ********* *** experience. She's God gifted and emphatic, comfortable, calm polite and friendly. She addresses her patients with gentle care and understanding, builds confidence & helps in decision making. Her touch has a miracle and you are in safe hands. The ambience in her clinic is soothing and her staff is courteous hence your mental and physical stress is subdued. I was operated by her and didn't realise when I went to the hospital and got discharged and came home safely. Everything was handled very smoothly and carefully, I recovered very fast. She's approachable anytime. Just seeing her half of your problems get solved and you feel very relaxed & satisfied. Speaking with her gave me immense courage and confidence. Thankyou Dr I love you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had visited Dr. Hemlata in regards to surgery and within the 1st meeting itself i was completely convinced that i would like to go ahead with her . The expertise that she hails , along with a comfortable approach made me believe that i had made the right choice. Doctor explained me the entire procedure that was supposed to be implemented and assured me that everything will be taken care in the best possible manner. Speaking to her gave me immense courage and confidence to go ahead with the surgery and things happened exactly the way i was told. Post surgery procedures were also handled very smoothly and doc personally is very approachable whenever required. I would strongly recommend Dr. Hemlata to everyone who would require any kind of consultation in regards to Gynaecological Problems, Vaginal Hysterectomy, Breast Examination, Laparoscopic Surgery, and deliveries Caesarean Section/ C-Section. She is going to be my go-to doctor for any further concerns in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Finding the correct gynac is a boon for every woman. Dr. Hemlata and her team are highly skilled, very friendly, extremely caring and leave no stone unturned to make you at ease. Dr.Hemlata hears you out very patiently, explains the issue and advises only the requisite course of medication. Unlike many other doctors, she will not give you unnecessary medicines or make you undergo any unnecessary test. I'm truly blessed to have discovered Dr. Hemlata and her wonderful team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been visiting Dr Hemlata Hardasani for about 6 years now. She is very kind and her treatments are always to the point and effective. She truly cares for our well-being. Doctor gives detailed care and attention to each patient and therefore there is a bit of a waiting time... but that is absolutely worth it because one knows she will treat your own case with the same care and consideration.

I highly recomend Dr. Hemlata she is the best!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor Hemlata is very understanding. She listens to your problems and offers guidance and practical solutions, leaving the final decision upto you. I felt very comfortable with her and her staff. They are extremely professional and friendly, making you feel at ease. I would highly recommend Doctor Hemlata. I have been visiting her for the past 8 years and it has always been a positive experience.

She was patiently listening to my explanation and guided me that I have a yeast infection. Some more tests are being done in which I will find out whether I have a UTI or not. But overall she made me feel very comfortable with such a touchy subject. She also answered any questions I had. I wish the price was a bit lesser but she was worth the comfort. Only thing is if you are going to her be prepared to wait. She has a long line of clients! But that’s also a GOOD sign!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would really like to thank dr hemlata and her team her hand is very soft no pain during the checkup really very friendly and trustworthy her way of explaining is amazing I would really recommend her without a doubt thank your doctor for making me feel comfortable

I would recommend the doctor to everyone who is planning to start a family. A big thank you and best wishes to the doctor.

Thank you Mother Care clinic and Dr Hemlata.
